alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Elk; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 1:20PM CDT until July 17 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... Eastern Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 120 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elk Falls, or 9 miles southeast of Howard, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Caney, Sedan, Dearing, Moline, Longton, Elk City, Tyro, Peru, Chautauqua, Elk Falls, Havana, Bolton, Niotaze, Elk City Lake, Elk City State Park, Hale and Independence Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
